Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 13 Piṭṭhiduka » 13.15 Niyyānikaduka » 13.15.7 Pañhāvāra » 13.15.7.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 13.15.7.2.1 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Piṭṭhiduka
Niyyānikaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
326.
4762Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, nanissaye pañca, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte satta…pe…  nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
